short_summary: Mac Ultra or equivalent for Royal Military College of Canada
description: The Royal Military College of Canada (RMC) has a requirement for the supply of five (5) Mac M1 Ultra workstations or equivalent as per the Statement of Requirement and the List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation.
full_summary:
### TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT
#### Invitation to Tender
FIC/ Sgt Sebastian Darif
Procurement Officer
Shared Services Canada
400 Cooper St, 6th floor, Ottawa Ontario
Email: [SebastienMajd.Darif@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:SebastienMajd.Darif@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
Phone: 613-866-5465
Fax: 613-866-5465

The Department of National Defense's, Royal Military College of Canada, has a requirement for the supply of five (5) Mac M1 Ultra workstations or equivalent as per the Statement of Requirement and the List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation.

#### Description of Requirement
The requisitioned Mac M1 Ultra workstations must be delivered to Kingston, Ontario and will be used for various purposes by the Royal Military College of Canada. A firm start date includes the delivery date, which will be 30 federal government working days from the contract award date.

#### Notice Details
*Reference Number: SSC-23-00021612:T*
*Publication Date: 25/01/2023*
*Closure Date: 03/02/2023 14:00:00*
*Trade Agreements: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*
*Solicitation Method: Competitive Open Bidding*
*Estimated contract value: [will be calculated based on the submitted bids]*
*Contract type: Goods and Services*
*Delivery destinations: Kingston, Ontario*
*Security Requirements: None*

#### Documents
Please refer to the [official solicitation documents](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login) for detailed information and requirements.

#### Enquiries and Submissions
All enquiries regarding this tender must be directed to the procurement officer and addressed in writing. Responses to bidder inquiries will not be provided.

Please click the link to access the solicitation and submit your offer:https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login

Note: All solicited documents can be submitted in either official language and the Government of Canada retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. 

- **Summary**
Shared Services Canada is undertaking a requirement for the Royal Military College of Canada to acquire Mac M1 Ultra workstations or equivalent. Interested suppliers are invited to submit an offer for goods and services. This tender is open to competitive open
